sentences.en: A man who wants to protect himself can don a condom.
sentences.cn: 男性要保护自己最好使用安全套.

sentences.en: Air trapped inside a condom could cause it to break.
sentences.cn: 安全套内藏空气会令安全套破烂.

sentences.en: But the complaint department at the condom company got an earful.
sentences.cn: 但避孕套公司给了我吃惊的回答.

sentences.en: If you a condom OEM needs, please contact us!
sentences.cn: 如果您有安全套OEM方面的需求请来电咨询!

sentences.en: Incorrect use can lead to condom slippage or breakage.
sentences.cn: 不正确的使用会导致安全套滑脱或破裂.

sentences.en: It can be used for the quality control of nonoxinol in condom.
sentences.cn: 可作为双保险避孕套中壬苯醇醚含量的质量控制标准.

sentences.en: Know you need a condom but aren't sure which kind?
sentences.cn: 你知道你需要使用安全套,但又不知应该购买那一款?

sentences.en: Make sure you wash your hands after you handled a used condom and before you have any further contact with your partner.
sentences.cn: 在处理了使用过的避孕套后，以及在和你的性伴侣有进一步的性接触之前，你一定要洗手。

sentences.en: Multiple sex partners were common. The rate of condom use was low.
sentences.cn: MSM中多性伴现象普遍, 安全套使用率较低.

sentences.en: No, I work in a condom factory & these are customer complaints.
sentences.cn: “不是.我在避孕套 工厂工作,而这些是顾客的投诉. ”

sentences.en: Once again, you need to be careful not to tear or puncture the condom in this process.
sentences.cn: 再说一遍，你要小心，在这个过程中不要撕裂或戳穿避孕套。

sentences.en: Sell condom alone or sell newspaper alone , namely monomer machine alone.
sentences.cn: 单独售套或单独售报, 即单体机.

sentences.en: That means , above all, the correct and consistent use of a condom.
sentences.cn: 这就意味著, 最重要的安全手段就是正确和坚持使用安全套.

sentences.en: The condom is a very effective contraceptive if used properly.
sentences.cn: 如果使用得当,避孕套是非常有效的避孕手段.

sentences.en: The director hears the news, busy group person sent one box condom.
sentences.cn: 主任闻讯, 忙派人送去了一箱避孕套.

sentences.en: Then you get to do it with a condom.
sentences.cn: 然后才是做些用得上安全套的事情.

sentences.en: Will a condom guarantee I won't get a sexually transmitted disease?
sentences.cn: 安全套能保证我不得性传播疾病 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: （男用）避孕套，保险套，（女用）避孕套
trans.tran_en: a thin rubber bag that a man wears over his  penis (= sex organ )  during sex, to prevent a woman having a baby or to protect against disease
